title: Supplementary Hunting
description: Following your advice, rural-dwelling citizens work to supplement stores of food and resources through hunting and trapping. Attempt a basic Wilderness check to gather excess livestock from the local wildlife, ranches, and farms to generate food commodities.

criticalSuccess.msg: <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="food" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d4">Gain 1d4 Food</button>, <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="luxuries" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Luxuries</button>, and <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="gain" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>

success.msg: Choose one: <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="food" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d4">Gain 1d4 Food</button>, <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="luxuries" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Luxuries</button>, or <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="gain" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>

failure.msg: Your hunters and trappers fail to supplement your stores and must spend time resupplying and setting new traps; you cannot attempt Supplementary Hunting on the next Kingdom turn.

criticalFailure.msg: Your hunters and trappers fail to supplement your stores and must spend time resupplying and setting new traps; you cannot attempt Supplementary Hunting on the next Kingdom turn. In addition, your hunters and trappers have accidentally attracted the attention of dangerous wildlife. Either <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d4">Gain 1d4 Unrest</button> or increase a Ruin of your choice by 1.
